nodes.text: R: team otway00219 : Shane Jeffries (Jeffries) is likely considering involvement in corporate espionage against Ultimate Audio (UA)
R: team otway00219 : Quantifiable evidence
R: team otway00219 : the conditions of Jeffries' work situation
R: team otway00219 : other circumstantial evidence discussed below, means Jeffries likely has both the intent and capability to conduct corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries’ demonstrated history of integrity and high standards of work reduce the likelihood he has begun stealing intellectual property

R: team otway00219 : A formal investigation will likely not be required if immediate steps are taken to mitigate Jeffries’ intent through addressing the likely bullying he is currently experiencing and greater covert surveillance of Jeffries systems access
R: team otway00219 : Prior to the bullying complaint lodged by Jeffries, he was exhibiting significantly fewer indicators of dishonest behaviour
R: team otway00219 : Due to the damage the organisation would almost certainly sustain if Jeffries is dismissed
R: team otway00219 : as the new product would unlikely be launched successfully and the stock price would likely drop
R: team otway00219 : it is recommended an attempt is made to safely retain him as a productive employee
R: team otway00219 : Increasing covert surveillance of Jeffries’ system access
R: team otway00219 : taking steps to address any bullying at UA is likely to minimise any negative reputational risks
R: team otway00219 : Both of these steps sidestep the potential security breach
R: team otway00219 : will not undermine customer confidence, particularly from the Department of Defence and other sensitive clients
R: team otway00219 : if UA’s proactive anti-bullying steps are purposefully made public, this could have a positive reputational effect for UA among prospective employees and the community at large
R: team otway00219 : if covert surveillance is unable to detect further attempts by Jeffries to commit corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : he is successful in doing so
R: team otway00219 : financial risks are likely to be realised
R: team otway00219 : If Jeffries provides UA's intellectual property to a competitor, the firm is likely to lose its competitive edge, resulting in a drop in share price
R: team otway00219 : If Jeffries’ attempt at corporate espionage are detected, UA will have to choose whether to terminate him or reprimand him in another way

R: team otway00219 : The former option will almost certainly result in a delayed launch of the MAX10 according to Jeffries’ manager, which in turn would hit UA’s share price and earnings by $1 and $7 million respectively
R: team otway00219 : If the latter option involves a non-disclosure agreement, UA may be able to escape this issue with little or no financial downside
R: team otway00219 : there is an even chance (49%) that Shane Jeffries (Jeffries) is involved in corporate espionage

team otway00219 : Although Jeffries polygraph test indicated that he was lying about maintaining confidentiality when he was hired three years ago, this piece of information alone only carries a 13.5% probability that Jeffries lied

Although Shane Jeffries polygraph test indicated that he was lying about maintaining confidentiality when he was hired three years ago, this piece of information alone only carries a 13.5% probability that Jeffries lied

R: team otway00219 : the probability that Jeffries is involved in corporate theft or espionage rises to 49%
R: team otway00219 : It is possible Jeffries is engaged in corporate espionage for Queen Tech

based on an anonymous allegation it is possible Shane Jeffries is involved in corporate espionage

the plausibility of the anonymous allegation is unknown

team otway00219 : Queen Tech is a major competitor of UA, with both promoting products at the upcoming SOUND FORUM
Queen Tech is a major competitor of Ultimate Audio, with both promoting products at the upcoming SOUND FORUM
R: team otway00219 : Queen Tech is a major competitor of UA, with both promoting products at the upcoming SOUND FORUM
team otway00219 : Jeffries worked for both NewTekDev and Queen Tech
Shane Jeffries worked for both NewTekDev and Queen Tech
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries worked for both NewTekDev and Queen Tech
team otway00219 : The manager of NewTekDev, Peyton Winger (Winger), and the Head of Technology Development at Queen Tech, Tzuyu Lee (Lee), are married
The manager of NewTekDev, Peyton Winger (Winger), and the Head of Technology Development at Queen Tech, Tzuyu Lee (Lee), are married
R: team otway00219 : The manager of NewTekDev, Peyton Winger (Winger), and the Head of Technology Development at Queen Tech, Tzuyu Lee (Lee), are married
team otway00219 : Winger provided an extremely positive reference when Jeffries applied for a position at UA
Peyton Winger provided an extremely positive reference when Shane Jeffries applied for a position at Ultimate Audio
R: team otway00219 : Winger provided an extremely positive reference when Jeffries applied for a position at UA
team otway00219 : phone logs confirm Winger and Jeffries remain in contact
phone logs confirm Peyton Winger and Shane Jeffries remain in contact
R: team otway00219 : phone logs confirm Winger and Jeffries remain in contact
team otway00219 : Lee and Winger have sufficient means to provide a financial incentive to engage in corporate espionage

R: team otway00219 : Lee and Winger have sufficient means to provide a financial incentive to engage in corporate espionage
team otway00219 : Lee was recently featured in a magazine, expressing a competitor advantage
Lee was recently featured in a magazine, expressing a competitor advantage
R: team otway00219 : Lee was recently featured in a magazine, expressing a competitor advantage

Lee and Winger were pictured in their newly renovated Barton two-storey apartment
R: team otway00219 : she and her husband were pictured in their newly renovated Barton two-storey apartment
team otway00219 : it is plausible Jeffries maintains a friendly relationship with Lee and would consider providing information to Queen Tech
it is plausible Shane Jeffries maintains a friendly relationship with Lee and would consider providing information to Queen Tech
R: team otway00219 : it is plausible Jeffries maintains a friendly relationship with Lee and would consider providing information to Queen Tech
R: team otway00219 : It is possible that Jeffries’ is planning a startup, and any theft of material is not intended for Queen Tech, but for his own startup
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries' personal possessions included a book about startups and technology
R: team otway00219 : pamphlet for the Startcon convention
R: team otway00219 : A photo on Jeffries’ Instagram captioned ‘great convention’ may indicate he was in attendance at Startcon which is the largest startup and growth conference in Australia
R: team otway00219 : The bank account shows two high value transactions
R: team otway00219 : including 9800 AUD to 'cover costs' to two individuals identified as MJ and SC who are not otherwise identified
R: team otway00219 : transaction of 21900 AUD from Beige Lawyers
R: team otway00219 : This could be deliberate obfuscation by the lawyers in settling a loan they have secured for Jeffries partner, Brian Diaz or another unknown windfall
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries’ phone log reveals he was recently in contact with a regular bank and a loan bank
R: team otway00219 : This could indicate he is attempting to secure funds for the purpose or starting a business
R: team otway00219 : The phone calls to the bank may also have been in relation to a recent purchase of a car
R: team otway00219 : It is likely Jeffries is being bullied in the workplace
R: team otway00219 : causing a change in his behaviour and increasing his vulnerability to considering corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : It is likely Jeffries is being bullied in the workplace, causing a change in his behaviour and increasing his vulnerability to considering corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : Disgruntled employees are the largest threat to an organisation for corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : Two weeks ago Jeffries sent a complaint regarding homophobic comments from two colleagues, Paul Gertrude and James Bourne (Bourne), to UA human resources
R: team otway00219 : It appears the complaint was not actioned, which would likely have made Jeffries feel undervalued and discontent
R: team otway00219 : It appears the complaint was not actioned
would likely have made Jeffries feel undervalued and discontent
R: team otway00219 : would likely have made Jeffries feel undervalued and discontent
R: team otway00219 : Following the incident, Jeffries posted an anti-bullying banner on Instagram
R: team otway00219 : Bourne has displayed indicators of jealousy towards Jeffries’ success
R: team otway00219 : He emailed an allegation to Jeffries’ line manager which was likely an attempt to discredit Jeffries and divert attention to his own ideas
R: team otway00219 : It is likely Jeffries had the capability to remove secret corporate information from the lab at UA
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries worked unusual hours during the last two weeks, which correlates to increases in his printing behaviour
R: team otway00219 : combined with his seating position by the door in the lab, increases the ability of Jeffries to secretly remove printed documents from the lab
R: team otway00219 : combined with his seating position by the door in the lab
R: team otway00219 : increases the ability of Jeffries to secretly remove printed documents from the lab

R: team otway00219 : Approximately 75% of corporate espionage occurs through the theft of a physical document, disk, flash drive or other piece of physical information, not through hacking, according to a leading cybersecurity company
R: team otway00219 : In addition, the book ‘Handbook of Image-based Security Techniques’ by Jasjit Suri, Shivendra Shivani, and Suneeta Agarwal was discovered in Jeffries desk
R: team otway00219 : The book provides instruction on how to hide and share information in the form of images
R: team otway00219 : UA uses strong security measures which would make it very difficult to remove information electronically using a storage device, and risky to remove printed documents
R: team otway00219 : The techniques in the book would circumvent the need to print documents and remove them physically, or to use a flash drive or other storage device
R: team otway00219 : It is likely Jeffries is using anabolic steroids, which increases the probability he would be involved in corporate espionage or theft
R: team otway00219 : it is unlikely (7%) that Jeffries returned a false negative result on his drug test
R: team otway00219 : The current UA drug test does not screen staff for the use of steroids
R: team otway00219 : Serophene was located in Jeffries' desk by UA security staff
R: team otway00219 : Serophene is used by male anabolic steroid users to reduce gynaecomastia (developing breasts) and water retention
R: team otway00219 : Anabolic steroids are used by body builders and recreational athletes to increase performance via muscle strength and size
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries' interests include the gym and powerlifting, which allows for an exposure to body building circles who anecdotally use anabolic steroids and serophene

R: team otway00219 : Three other supplements in Jeffries desk are also used to reduce the effects of steroids on sperm count and enhance muscle growth: Folic acid and Zinc is taken to increase sperm production and L-carnitine increase muscle growth when taken with steroids

R: team otway00219 : Folic acid, L-carnitine and Panax ginseng (also found in Jeffries’ drawer) have the added effect of improving overall physical performance by assisting and increasing muscle function
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries could have used these medications were to increase fertility with the purpose of starting a family
R: team otway00219 : open source research indicates serophene is rarely prescribed to men for this purpose
R: team otway00219 : team otway00219 : Jeffries could have used these medications were to increase fertility with the purpose of starting a family
R: team otway00219 : Administering anabolic steroids is illegal in Australia without a medical prescription
R: team otway00219 : There is no mention of Jeffries declaring he takes prescription medicine serophene and steroids prior to his last three drug screenings
R: team otway00219 : If Jeffries is using anabolic steroids without a prescription, this it is a disregard of the law and could indicate further disregard for the law
R: team otway00219 : steroids have caused a personality change, causing his relationship with colleagues to become strained
R: team otway00219 : It is possible that a recent high value purchase indicates employee behaviour consistent with corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : Social Media indicates Jeffries has  recently purchased of 2018 or 2019 Hyundai i30 N, which retail for between  20,000 and 45,000 AUD (second hand)
R: team otway00219 : The vehicle could be an indication of an additional source of revenue, possibly a kickback from corporate espionage
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries and Diaz are a dual income couple with no children, and the appearance of the car on both their Instagram pages indicates they are sharing the purchase
R: team otway00219 : It is also a reasonable assumption that the car may be under a lease or loan arrangement, based on recent phone calls to a loans bank
R: team otway00219 : It is almost certain that UA’s stock price and earnings will fall if the MAX10 is not released
R: team otway00219 : In order for the release of MAX10 to remain on schedule, it is recommended to address the allegations of bullying that Jeffries has raised
R: team otway00219 : If Jeffries’ is considering theft as a result of being a disgruntled employee, addressing these issues may prevent this activity
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries has a history of being a valuable employee
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries has demonstrated his ability to be an excellent employee, requiring minimal supervision, demonstrating maturity and possessing a valuable skill set
R: team otway00219 : The interview report by his former manager describes him as hardworking, punctual and friendly, which is supported by positive reports by his current manager
R: team otway00219 : Jeffries has demonstrated his competence to produce high quality work, as well as maintain confidentiality while working on a Department of Defence project

R: team otway00219 : He graduated from a prestigious Australian university with First Class honours, is spoken of highly by past and present employers and is ‘pivotal to the development’ of a new product
